text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump MUST SEE Scientific paper shows SARS was cross infected with corona virus. Strangely on March 20 it was updated to hide names of Xing-Yi Ge & Zhengli-Li Shi WUHAN department of Virology.  CLICK PDF  at top to see names . #coronavirus
